  • worker.sslyze_worker module

worker.sslyze_worker module¶

This worker analyzes hosts similarly to how SSLyze does.

class WorkerProcess(qm, available_commands)[source]¶

Bases: multiprocessing.process.Process

This class checks hosts from the host_queue with the settings specified in settings.py.

run()[source]¶
main()[source]¶

Starts as many sslyze worker processes as specified in settings.
